com.illcode.meterman

Interface Persistence

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KryoPersistence

    public interface Persistence
    Implementations of this interface are responsible for serializing and deserializing WorldState instances to and from streams.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorldState copyWorldState(WorldState ws)
      Make a deep copy of a WorldState instance.
      void dispose()
      Dispose of any resources.
      void init()
      Initialize the persistence implementation
      WorldState loadWorldState(InputStream in)
      Load a WorldState instance from an InputStream.
      void saveWorldState(WorldState state, OutputStream out)
      Save a WorldState instance to an OutputStream.
